question: Which Indian state hosted the 2017 International Federation of Sport Climbing (IFSC) World Cup?
explanation: The 6th edition of International Federation of Sport Climbing (IFSC) World Cup was held at the CIDCO Exhibition Centre in Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra on June 24 - 25, 2017. Over 150 athletes from across the globe will participate at the World Cup including the top talent from India.
